text.section: If the county commissioners abate a violation of a zoning law, the county commissioners may assess against the property the reasonable costs of the abatement.

The assessment shall be:
added to the annual tax bill of the property to be collected in the same manner as ordinary taxes are collected; and
subject to the same interest and penalty for nonpayment as provided by law for the nonpayment of county taxes.
The assessment is a lien against the property from the date of assessment until paid.
